text:
August 16, 1956
Miss Anna L. Hyer
Associate Executive Secretary
Department of Audio-Visual Instruction
National Education Association
1201 Sixteenth Street Northwest,
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Ann*
With regard to your letter of August 13, here are the
names and addresses you need!
Basil Thornton, BBC
North American Representative
The British Broadcasting Corp.
630 Fifth Avenue
New York 20, N. I.
Mrs. Alice Lewitin, RDF
Freiach Broadcasting System
972 5th Ave.
New York 21, N. Y.
David Randolph
420 East 86th St.
New York 28, N. Y.
Thanks for a copy of the letter you are sending out.
I hope it brings results.
With best wishes,
Cordially,
REU/ok
Robert E. Underwood, Jr*
Network Manager
